lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: My mother herself was given a chance to rise out of poverty. While she made it, so many others haven't and I still witness it in my travels. Now, with the blessings that I have here in the developed world, I wish to help give that chance to others.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I don't have a good reason.  Why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I place merchandise on shelves in an orderly fashion to make it appealing to buy.

lenders.name: Gil - West Hills, CA
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small construction company in Los Angeles, California USA.  We do remodeling projects, room additions in both residential and commercial areas.  I very much enjoy the construction process.  It is such a great feeling to start a project as well as seeing the final results when the job is completed.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: the world is bigger than i am

lenders.name: Rennie
lenders.loan_because: I think it helps.
lenders.occupational_info: A college student from Nepal, studying in the US.

lenders.name: Ed!
lenders.loan_because: I feel like I'm one of the lucky people who benefits greatly from the labors of developing countries by living in a developed nation.  I want to give back so people in other nations who don't have it as easy as I did can achieve their dreams, too.

lenders.name: Joseph & Julie
lenders.loan_because: we were able to start our business due to a loan from a successful businessman.
lenders.occupational_info: We design environmentally and human friendly buildings:  personal sustainable design.

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: my sister gave us gift certificates for Christmas and this is a direct way to help other much less advantaged that us.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide psychological services (psychotherapy and psychological assessments) in a private practice setting.

lenders.name: Just2Turtles
lenders.loan_because: We, in the US, don't have a clue about real poverty. A mere $25 dollars can buy incredible opportunity for someone struggling to survive in the third world.

lenders.name: Christopher & Ella Blue
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I support school teachers and students with their technology and communication needs.

lenders.name: Sami
lenders.loan_because: In order to take one must first give.
lenders.occupational_info: Artistic advertising.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I believe in supporting people who have a strong work ethic and want to improve their lives.  I don't believe in giving a hand out, but I think that giving someone a hand up is a moral obligation we all have as human beings.  No one succeeds on their own.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help. It's the right thing to do!
lenders.occupational_info: I LOVE to knit and would like to make my living off it. By lending to people with knitting/fabric businesses maybe I can make that dream come true for others...

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of a "hand up", rather than a "hand out".  Others have helped me, so in a small way, maybe I can help others.

lenders.name: Jim & Mary
lenders.loan_because: Giving a hand up to help someone be successful feels great!

lenders.name: My Linh
lenders.loan_because: why not?

lenders.name: Dafnie
lenders.loan_because: I am of Haitian descent so my family comes from poverty. I also am a young, Christian woman who loves helping others! I am in school studying finance so Kiva has definitely grabbed my attention because it combines my interest in helping third world countries and in finance. I love how I can help someone with just one click of a button.

lenders.name: Bo and Michael!
lenders.loan_because: money is only worth anything if it is making lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: Michael is a professor and I am the program manager of a University Honors Program...we are both temporary beings hoping to leave this world with good work and little impact from our use....

lenders.name: John Hering
lenders.loan_because: the only way to predict the future is to invent it.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: To give others the sense of financial security and ultimately independence.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I have been abundantly blessed and wish to bless others.

lenders.name: Nigel
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Asset Management

lenders.name: Mary Anna
lenders.loan_because: We are only a drop of water alone, but together we are a ocean!!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I think that my work has been great!

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: through hard work and perseverance ANYTHING is possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I help deliver medical treatments to patients all over the world who suffer from immunological diseases.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: we are all global citizens and responsible for each others peace and well-being.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with teachers in a high school helping them use reading and writing strategies in all content areas, not just English classes.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should do what they can to help others.

lenders.name: Linda A
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to contribute to a change for people and the world.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to promote health and prevent disease in children and adolescents.

lenders.name: Byron
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: My company manufactures the best insulation in the world.

lenders.name: Tod & Carrie
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance really helps!
lenders.occupational_info: Carrie manages the corporate taxes for a large US clothing retailer.  Tod is a homemaker and cares for our children.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: it's good to pass it on.

lenders.name: Phillip
lenders.loan_because: of my Tanzanian friends.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a former secondary English and social studies teacher who now works at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. My job is to work with local secondary teachers on improving their teaching methods.

lenders.name: ash
lenders.loan_because: if capitalization ends poverty; it's criminal not to.
lenders.occupational_info: computer networks, programming, electronics manufacturing and robotics.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Student.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I look for opportunity to share some of the wealth that God has given me in this life.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I know a little can go a long way :)
lenders.occupational_info: Full time Graduate Student studying Physics.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I work FT at Illinois Dept. of Children and Family Services.  They state helps me. And, I indirectly help the children of Illinois.   Why not just take a bit of the money the state affords to me to help others..  Why even think twice about it.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: The money I waste should be used to give food and education to people who are hungry for both.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software to make managing retirement easier.

lenders.name: Ganesh
lenders.whereabouts: Team LOTUS Lend Out To Uplift Self-sufficiency

lenders.name: Stagesx3
lenders.loan_because: Delivering small amounts of money directly to the people who can put it to use is the way to make a real difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a call center that takes orders for product used in building homes.

lenders.name: Juan
lenders.loan_because: God has seen fit to bless me with so much and I am moved by That Grace to help ease the burden of others in some way...Kiva allows me to do that.
lenders.occupational_info: I am employed by my state to defend mentally ill persons accused of crimes who do not have enough money to hire their own private attorney.

lenders.name: Trish
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others.

lenders.name: Will
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel like I'm doing something for someone. I get a great feeling when I make a loan. I wish I could afford more and more often.

lenders.name: sharad
lenders.loan_because: i can.
lenders.occupational_info: student @ georgia tech

lenders.name: Mike & Cindy & Boys
lenders.loan_because: We want to help the world to become a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an assistant principal at an elementary school and my wife is an administrator at a small college. My boys are in Grades 5, 7, and 10.

lenders.name: Bethie
lenders.loan_because: I love knowing that I have helped people and their communities in a creative and sustainable way.  I trust in the ingenuity and creativity of the people I loan to and I feel a sense of pride when they are able to repay their loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional singer.  I feel very lucky that I am able make a living doing what I love to do.  I hope my loans allow other people to make a living doing what they love to do too!

lenders.loan_because: i can...

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: I loan because everyone deserves a fare chance. And I want to make a affronts in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 25 years old. Some of my favorite things to do is talk to friends and watch TV. My favorite show is Star Trek The Next Generation. I love because the morals that it teaches with them being humanitarians.

lenders.name: Ramon
lenders.loan_because: I saw an ad for kiva featuring Bill Clinton and it seemed like a very good idea.  I'm happy to help people finance their entrepreneurial dreams in this small way.

lenders.name: Lance
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place by enabling you to give your children a happier life.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and implement software to help companies run their business, grow successfully, and make more profits.

lenders.name: Jose Garcia
lenders.loan_because: I like the fact that, through Kiva, all the money goes to the person asking for a loan and not only 10cents out of every dollar.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a laboratory and do biological tests that helps us understand diseases and disorders better so that hopefully a cure may one day come out of these test.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: Give, and it shall be given unto you; good measure, pressed down, and shaken together, and running over, shall men give into your bosom. For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again. ---- May God bless your family and your business.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to make people well and to care for people when they cannot take care of themselves.

lenders.name: Stephen & Sarah
lenders.loan_because: My wife & I both feel that everyone deserves a chance to succeed.  Sarah was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Nicaragua and enjoyed every minute of her time there.  We are looking to continue the momentum she helped create during her service.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a senior manager at a software company managing the worldwide sales relationship between my company and one of the worlds largest computer manufacturer's.  
Sarah is a high school teacher, teaching in the Plato program.  It is a credit recovery program that helps kids get back on track through an online curriculum and further reducing the dropout rate.

lenders.name: TriadMastermind for Real Estate
lenders.loan_because: To honor those who gave their time, talents, and their treasures. We want everyone to have a chance at being self-supporting
lenders.occupational_info: Buy and sell real estate. We are educators and mentors to real estate entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky that people gave me  opportunities. Now it's my turn to give other people opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a daily newspaper in rural Pennsylvania. I cover education, government, business, crime, and anything else that comes up in my area.

lenders.name: Doug and Julie
lenders.loan_because: We are lucky enough to be able to help someone improve their life
lenders.occupational_info: Julie is a nurse that takes care of mother's and babies after birth. Doug runs an electrical contracting business.

lenders.name: dvsDave
lenders.loan_because: it's more responsible and in the long run, can help more people than a charitable contribution.

lenders.name: Zachary
lenders.loan_because: My cousin Ross sent me a Kiva Gift Certificate.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a third grade student  in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

lenders.name: Anomaly
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Wang Ning
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people but I am disillusioned about giving to charity. With many needing the donation money for supporting their infrastructure rather than using it for their causes.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: it is sustainable development in its truest form.

lenders.name: cecilia
lenders.loan_because: I like to give back  what I recieved from God.
lenders.occupational_info: I m interior designer.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who have had brain injuries or strokes, and can no longer speak or swallow.

lenders.name: Vineet
lenders.loan_because:
In the absence of providence we have the infinite potential of the human spirit.

No one way of ameliorating poverty exists; pursue every avenue to help others.

lenders.name: Jeannie
lenders.loan_because: I like the way if feels to help another person achieve their goal.
lenders.occupational_info: Unemployed and looking for that great new opportunity.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I want to do more good in the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
I take people on wilderness expeditions (backpacking, canoeing and climbing) so they can learn to be better to themselves, to each other and to the world.
I also play guitar and cello, and sing and write songs.

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: I can, and thus should.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair and install machines that measure materials as they pass through the machine.

lenders.name: Leila
lenders.loan_because: I want to give to other people.  I am not only serving my community but the world.  People deserve the opportunity to have the chance to make a living and create a business.  I am giving that chance to others by doing this.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student so I learn, but what I am making of my education is so much more than just learning.  I am part of Amnesty International, fighting for human rights, and serving my community.  My life is not only based around learning, but that learning has taught me to be giving.

lenders.name: James/Data4marketers.com
lenders.loan_because: I see good investments all around... All you need to do is look for them.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest in several daily/live optin and coreg data feeds. I distribute these feeds to marketers around the world engaged in: email marketing, telemarketing, and direct/postal marketing with data that is diverse enough to cover sources for any type of product or category a company could be looking to promote.

lenders.name: Ela
lenders.loan_because: This can be a way to reach out to those who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: Even if is small I want to help make a difference.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because:
Entrepreneurs and small businesses are critical to local economies. 
I like to lend to people who make things with their own hands.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to create and maintain affordable housing options for residents of my city.

lenders.name: Clare
lenders.loan_because: I became inspired after learning about this amazing technique used to help pull people out of poverty. It really makes me feel excited and happy to see how people in such harsh situations can go from being impoverished to empowered.

lenders.name: Johan
lenders.loan_because: the people that have the will, the passion and the ability to try to take control over their life and future should be supported. One of the most important aspects in life: helping eachother anyway we can to make it a better place!
lenders.occupational_info: running a group of small companies, all focussed on imporoving the quality of life, play and work.

lenders.name: Clubbers
lenders.loan_because: capitalism is what makes the world go round.
lenders.occupational_info: Making sure the cash is where we think it is

lenders.name: Elisa
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have the ability to maximize what they can do with their God given talents and skills.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying science right now to become a doctor when I am older.

lenders.name: Roxana
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Chanel
lenders.loan_because: I myself is a entrepreneur who doesn't mind helping other entrepreneurs achieve their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently at Chico State majoring in entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: Sonya
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Eckley
lenders.loan_because: It's fashionable to do so

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital where I help pregnant women and people who are sick.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: we are to be held accountable for the money that God loans us do we use it for the good of people that has less then us or do we use it for self centeredness? we will each have to answer someday
lenders.occupational_info: i provide the labor and material to put a roof over the heads of peoples houses

lenders.name: Jean-mark
lenders.loan_because: I was given a Kiva gift certificate from a very good friend as a birthday gift and I am so excited to help people around the world.

lenders.name: jacobus
lenders.loan_because: I would like to support small entrepenuers in building their dreams and believe this is an excellent way to do this!
lenders.occupational_info: I am owner /Managing Director of a small but   very international project managemnet training & consultancy company.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I feel God has called me to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I pay people for the jobs they do.

lenders.name: Burn The Box Investments
lenders.occupation: Software and Services Provider, Global Investor
lenders.loan_because: We believe that if the world is our market, then we must not simply profit, but invest in that same market to sustain ourselves, and our customers.
lenders.occupational_info: Mobile Application Software, Business Strategy and Operations Consulting Services.  Global Investments.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Its an investment in someone's future.

lenders.name: Yoann
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in the collective power of individuals to make a difference.
Through Kiva, I can help people improve their lives by sponsoring their own initiatives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the development of in-flight entertainment and communication systems for commercial aircraft

lenders.name: Joao
lenders.loan_because:
It is better than simple giving donations. This encourages people to produce and find sustainable methods to help themselves.

It provides opportunity without us imposing on people what their livelihood should be.

It is about helping those who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Universally the same as any student. Trying to learn without getting distracted.

lenders.name: Logan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people become more successful entrepreneurs and allow impoverished people sustain a better way of life.
lenders.occupational_info: Freshman in high school

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Who wouldn't do this?

lenders.name: Bobby
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Shinta
lenders.loan_because: I feel very privileged in my current situation and want to make an impact for people who are in need of capital to realize their great ideas
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying Social Sciences and am trying to understand the world (but I guess these kinds of studies will never end)

lenders.name: Tyler

lenders.name: Deborah

lenders.occupational_info: Our club does service projects for animals, the environment, and humanitarian projects.

lenders.name: Brandi
lenders.loan_because: I like knowing that something small from me can have a large impact on someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and create necklaces, bracelets, earrings etc.  I also coach swimming to children ages 6-18.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I care and I can.

lenders.name: niel
lenders.loan_because: to have a capital for a new planned buy and sell business
lenders.occupational_info: just like a secretary.im always with my boss wherever she is .

lenders.name: Louise
lenders.loan_because: Want to make a small difference in other peoples lives.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity.

lenders.name: Shehan
lenders.loan_because: It's my way of showing a small bit of gratitude for the blessings I have enjoyed in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a fund.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes the problems of the world seem so insurmountable! Kiva allows me to make a drop in the bucket, in increments I can afford, with people who are not just looking for a handout but a way to improve their lives through their own hard work.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: Being lucky enough to be born in a wealthy nation should not be the condition that  decides the success of aspirations.
lenders.occupational_info: I research and implement computer based technology for an entertainment company.

lenders.name: Abby
lenders.loan_because: I want to help!

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: One morning, the tide descends on a beach littered with thousands of star fish, and a woman is picking up starfish and returning them to the water one by one.  A man walks by and comments on the impossible task. You can't possibly save them all, it's too late, most will perish, why are you doing this?  She replies because it makes a difference to the ones I return to the water.

lenders.name: Roy
lenders.loan_because: I understand how hard it can be to be successful when starting from little.
lenders.occupational_info: I write programs, the instructions that tell computers what to do.

lenders.name: Jonathan Merritt
lenders.loan_because:
I like to change people lives who are striving on their own and only looking for a hand up,
not a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: I drive a tractor trailer and haul off demolished buildings and also am a landlord. I also raise Koi,Catfish and bream

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I want to help end poverty through entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a company that buys and builds buildings.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: I have some money that I want to share with others...

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: David

lenders.occupational_info: I help people in a library.

lenders.name: Violet
lenders.loan_because: Its the best idea ever

lenders.name: Mary&Brian
lenders.loan_because: we want to make the world a better place!

lenders.name: Annie & Denzil
lenders.loan_because: This is a chance to make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: Annie works in a small consulting firm, helping people with job change and career development; Denzil works in a university, in an injury studies research centre.

lenders.name: GIVBAK
lenders.loan_because:
1) It's the right thing to do.
2) If you want to improve the world then take action; don't wait for someone else to do it.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: It's the little I can do from here.
lenders.occupational_info: I draft and negotiate contracts for businesses.

lenders.name: Roy
lenders.loan_because:
"If you give a little more
 than you're asking for
your love will turn the key."
 Andy and Barry Gibb

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because:
Blessed is he that considers the poor: the LORD will deliver him in time of trouble.
~Psalm 41:1

lenders.name: Pete
lenders.loan_because: This is the way the world should work.
lenders.occupational_info: No matter what your profession, you will inevitably become a teacher. I prefer more involvement and much faster results therefore I coach.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: My friend Sandy gave me the opportunity to loan as a gift.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a service for a very large company, but my husband and I also own a beauty salon and we also raise cattle.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: Used to make loans because I felt it made a meaningful difference in the borrowers lives and helped them, at least slightly, extricate themselves from a life of poverty. Now I plan to quit Kiva and never loan again because I do not believe debt finance is a fair and compassionate method to help the world's poorer entrepreneurs. I do not want undue burdens to be placed on the borrowers should their plan not work out. I suggest others do the same so more do not end up like many of the borrowers of Grameen bank in India.
lenders.occupational_info: I count beans and do paperwork.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I am here because someone reached out to me, just repaying the favor.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who have gotten in trouble with the Police, or Drugs.

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I interview and hire people to provide services that help people change and rebuild their lives. Through a variety of services we work with children, families and refugees.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner. It is very rewarding to help others around the world by providing funds for their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: My company publishes books, and also helps authors self-publish their books.

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: What better way to help the world then by giving your fellow man a chance to succeed.  This is what we are called to do!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell to the construction industry in the Chicago , IL. area.
